dict.acceptation: 溢出；泼出；涌出；蜂拥而出；
洒出（量）；泼出（量）；溢出（量）；小塞子；

sent.orig: Application to SAR oil spill image shows that the oil spill domain is filterd out efficiently.
sent.trans: 在海面溢油合成孔径雷达遥感图像的处理中，能够有效地提取海面溢油区域。

sent.orig: He is an expert in spill production and spill quality.
sent.trans: 他是木片生产和木片质量方面的专家。

sent.orig: This oil spill along the shores was a potential ecological disaster.
sent.trans: 这次沿海岸的石油溢流可能造成生态灾难。

sent.orig: A view of the oil spill at Dalian's port in Liaoning province on July 21, 2010.
sent.trans: 一个在大连的辽宁省对2010年7月21日全省港口溢油看法。

sent.orig: Well, Bella, looks like you took quite a spill. How do you feel?
sent.trans: 好吧Bella看起来你摔的不轻觉得怎么样？
